name: Add-in with notification toast
description: Highlights the currently-selected range and reports its address via a Fabric-based notification toast.

name: Document-object to DOM interaction
description: Lists all of the tables in the workbook, and creates a clickable hyperlink for each table.

name: Report-generation
description: Writes data to the workbook, applies basic formatting, and adds a chart bound to that data.

name: Basic "async/await" use
description: Apply values and formatting to a range using the TypeScript "async/await" syntax

name: Basic "set" action
description: Gets the current selection and applies formatting to it.

name: Get selected data
description: Gets the text of the current selection using, the Common APIs that were first introduce in Office 2013.
